caseStudies.title: Find My Security - Comprehensive Security Marketplace Platform
caseStudies.description: Developed a revolutionary web platform connecting security service seekers with verified security providers, training companies, and individual professionals across the UK, featuring advanced matching algorithms and comprehensive vetting systems.

caseStudies.title: Magnify-It - Premium Magnifying Glass E-commerce Platform
caseStudies.description: Developed a sophisticated e-commerce platform for Magnify-It, specializing in high-end and regular magnifying glasses for men and women, featuring advanced product filtering, detailed specifications, and seamless shopping experience with integrated payment solutions.

caseStudies.title: AI-Driven Smart Warehouse Automation System
caseStudies.description: Transformed a logistics company's warehouse operations with intelligent automation, implementing AI-powered inventory management, robotic picking systems, and predictive maintenance, achieving 45% efficiency improvement and Â£2.3M annual savings.

caseStudies.title: Multi-National Enterprise Cloud Infrastructure Migration
caseStudies.description: Orchestrated a complex cloud migration for a multinational corporation, moving 500+ applications to AWS with zero downtime, implementing DevOps practices, and achieving 60% cost reduction whilst improving system performance and scalability.
